hints.content:
$327 = 808 -{\goldE{?}}$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 808 back to point 327 is labeled, minus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/472a4468a30db371de347ff74cfe5d97640768ed)

Let's start by subtracting hundreds from ${808}$ until we get as close to  ${327}$ as possible without going below ${327}$.

$\begin{align}
{808} -\purpleD{100}=708\\\\
{708} -\purpleD{100}= 608\\\\
{608} -\purpleD{100}= 508\\\\
{508} -\purpleD{100}= 408
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\purpleD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{4 00}$, we reach $408$. We cannot subtract any more hundreds without going below ${327}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 808 back to a new point 408 labeled, "minus 400"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9695ca85fd43cacb5da43a5e9cd93d4a8b5ef434)

Next, let's subtract tens from $408$ until we get as close to  ${327}$ as possible without going below ${327}$.

$\begin{align}
408 -\blueD{10}=398\\\\
{398} -\blueD{10}= 388\\\\
{388} -\blueD{10}= 378\\\\
{378} -\blueD{10}= 368\\\\
{368} -\blueD{10}= 358\\\\
{358} -\blueD{10}= 348\\\\
{348} -\blueD{10}= 338\\\\
{338} -\blueD{10}= 328
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\blueD{8 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{80}$, we reach $328$. We cannot subtract any more tens without going below ${327}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 408 back to a new point 328 labeled, "minus 80"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e42491da2fd9fb77ccf9e06d4b81939152c1d3ef)

Finally, how many ones should we subtract from $328$ to get to  ${327}?$

$328 -\greenD{1}={327}$

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 328 back to point 327 labeled, "minus 1"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4082df7fc16f82c08ccd2637785fb299aa55d54f)

We subtracted $\purpleD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{8 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{1\text{ one}}$ from ${808}$ to get to ${327}$.

$\purpleD{4 00}+\blueD{8 0}+\greenD{1}=\goldE{481}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 808 to point 327 is labeled, "minus 481." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "minus 400," "minus 80," and "minus 1."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3b5c562081d02e01228045ea5410c76ed7fbe7bc)
